metadata.feature_description: Create and edit rich HTML content using a WYSIWYG editor with inline editing capabilities

steps.action: Navigate to page in edit mode and locate empty HTML module
steps.expected: Empty HTML module should show 'Click here to edit content' placeholder
steps.actual: Found HTML module (ID 468) in topHero pane with edit placeholder

steps.action: Click on the HTML module to open inline editor
steps.actual: Inline editing toolbar appeared with formatting buttons (Bold, Italic, Underline, Lists, Link, HTML, Insert image, Advanced Editor)

steps.action: Type new content: 'Test HTML Content - Created via Inline Editor'
steps.expected: Content should be entered into the module
steps.actual: Content was typed successfully and displayed in the editor area

steps.action: Click on HTML module with existing content to open inline editor
steps.expected: Inline editor should open with existing content loaded
steps.actual: Inline editor opened showing existing content in editable form with toolbar

steps.action: Modify content by selecting and typing new text
steps.expected: Content should be modified in place
steps.actual: Content was modified successfully via inline editing

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit content in separate edit page

steps.action: Click 'Advanced Editor' button in inline toolbar
steps.expected: Full CKEditor dialog should open in a modal
steps.actual: Advanced Editor dialog opened with CKEditor showing full WYSIWYG toolbar with Source, Cut, Copy, Paste, Undo, Redo, Find, Replace, Form elements, and formatting options

steps.action: Edit content in full editor mode
steps.expected: Content should be editable with full formatting capabilities
steps.actual: Full editor loaded content and allowed editing with comprehensive WYSIWYG features

steps.action: Select text and click Bold button (B)
steps.actual: Text became bold - element path shows 'body > p > strong' confirming bold was applied

steps.expected: Full formatting toolbar should be available
steps.actual: CKEditor toolbar available with: Source, Cut, Copy, Paste, PasteText, PasteFromWord, Undo, Redo, Find, Replace, SelectAll, Scayt, Form, Checkbox, Radio, TextField, Textarea, Select, Button, ImageButton, HiddenField, Bold, Italic, Underline, Strike, Subscript, Superscript, RemoveFormat, NumberedList, BulletedList, Outdent, Indent, Blockquote, CreateDiv, JustifyLeft, JustifyCenter, JustifyRight, JustifyBlock, BidiLtr, BidiRtl, Language, Link, Unlink, Anchor, Image, Table, HorizontalRule, SpecialChar, Iframe, Styles, Format, Font, FontSize, TextColor, BGColor, Maximize

steps.action: Click 'Insert image' button in inline editor toolbar
steps.actual: Image Properties dialog opened with tabs: Image Info, Link, Upload, Advanced. Contains URL field with Browse Server button, alternative text field, and image dimension controls

steps.expected: Dialog should have options for URL, upload, and image properties
steps.actual: Dialog contains: URL textbox, Browse Server button, Alternative Text, Width/Height with lock ratio, Border, HSpace, VSpace, Alignment dropdown, and 4 tabs for different input methods

steps.action: Apply bold formatting using toolbar button
steps.expected: Text should be wrapped in strong tags
steps.actual: Bold formatting applied - element path shows 'body > p > strong'

steps.expected: Italic, Underline, Strike, Lists and other styles should be available
steps.actual: Full formatting toolbar available including: Italic (I), Underline (U), Strike, Subscript, Superscript, RemoveFormat, Numbered/Bulleted Lists, Indent/Outdent, Text alignment options, Font size, Colors

steps.action: Close the Advanced Editor dialog without clicking Save
steps.expected: Dialog should close without saving changes
steps.actual: Dialog closed when clicking outside or closing. Note: Auto-save feature (5 second interval) may have saved content automatically based on code review (TIME_TO_AUTOSAVE = 5000 in EditHtml.ascx)

steps.action: Click outside inline editor to trigger auto-save
steps.actual: Content was saved - verified by page showing updated content. Auto-save functionality works via AJAX POST to HtmlTextPro/Save endpoint

steps.action: Verify content persists after page interaction
steps.expected: Saved content should be visible in the module
steps.actual: Content 'Test HTML Content - Created via Inline Editor' displayed correctly in module after save

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case: Special characters and XSS prevention

steps.action: Enter content with script tags, special characters, Unicode, and emojis: '<script>alert("XSS")</script> & © ™ € £ ¥ ñ ü ö 日本語 '
steps.expected: Script tags should be escaped/encoded, special characters should display correctly
steps.actual: Script tag displayed as text (not executed) - XSS properly prevented. All special characters (©, ™, €, £, ¥, ñ, ü, ö), Japanese text (日本語), and emoji displayed correctly

steps.action: Select all content and delete to create empty module
steps.actual: Empty content accepted - editor area shows blank white space. System allows modules with no content

steps.action: Enter very long content (5019 characters of repeated 'A' characters ending with '- END OF LONG TEXT')
steps.expected: System should accept large amount of content
steps.actual: All 5019 characters accepted and displayed correctly. Text wraps properly and '- END OF LONG TEXT' marker visible at end confirming all content saved

observations: The HTML module supports both inline editing and full-page editing (Advanced Editor) modes
Auto-save functionality is implemented with a 5-second interval (TIME_TO_AUTOSAVE = 5000ms in EditHtml.ascx)
Content is saved via AJAX POST to HtmlTextPro/Save endpoint using ServicesFramework
The system properly encodes HTML entities and prevents XSS attacks by displaying script tags as text
CKEditor is used as the rich text editor with comprehensive formatting capabilities
The inline editor provides a streamlined toolbar with essential formatting options
Content versioning is supported through IVersionable interface in HtmlTextController
The module supports localized content with master language content display option
BeforeUnload event handler ensures content is auto-saved when navigating away
